abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet front loop back loop tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - orange green brown and pink - yarn needle - scissors - stuffing final size - height 8 cm and width 8 cm technical notes *finish all pieces before attaching them together *make sure you stuff the flowerpot *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *chains and slip stitches are not included in the stitch count unless stated otherwise *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern flowerpot orange round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts *work in the back loop for round 4 only round 4-7 chain 1 make 1 half_double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts *work in the front loop for round 8 only round 8 chain 1 make 1 half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts followed by 2 half_double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts *work in the back loop for round 9 only round 9 chain 1 make 1 half_double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts *fasten_off dirt brown round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts *fasten_off stuff the flowerpot and sew on the dirt *slip stitches are included in the stitch count for the leaves only leaves green make 3 step 1 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook step 2 make 1 slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet and 1 double_crochet you should have 1 chain left to work in 5 sts step 3 work all 6 stitches into the last chain in the last chain make 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet and 2 double_crochet 6 sts step 4 start working on the opposite side
